snippet: A week after Madonna blanketed the world with her new song "Gimme All Your Luvin'," MTV is preparing a global, multiplatform unveiling of Taylor Swift's video "Safe & Sound"; "magic money" from iTunes Match; iLike meets its end.
abstract: A week after Madonna blanketed the world with her new song "Gimme All Your Luvin'," MTV is preparing a global, multiplatform unveiling of Taylor Swift's video "Safe & Sound"; "magic money" from iTunes Match; iLike meets its end.

headline.main: Digital Notes: Taylor Swift's Multiplatform Premiere via Viacom
